Would you guys please SHUT THE FUCK UP?!! ALL seeders are seeding, and ALL leechers are sharing. In order to be a seeder you have to be *seeding* a full file, in order to be a leecher you have to be *sharing* a partial file. And believe it or not, leechers are more responsible for a torrent being fast than seeders are.

If you are only hooking up to 23 seeders, that is because of MANY reasons, a few of which are a result of your local setup like client/router/modem/OS options. The rest, a result of proxies, network throttling and IP sector bans, DNS servers, the list goes on... and on and on.

This wasn't meant to be 'fun,' but you people are surmising that it would be the implication of the company to do so. I think it's great and serves its intended purpose.
